name: The I.T Guy
description:
A submission for the 'Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2' with the theme of CHOAS!

With a few hours to spare each day, here is what we made.

'The I.T Guy'

It's a boring old Monday & you're working the overtime shift, making sure there are no computer issues while everyone else is out of the office...

As time goes by, the nightmare-inducing computer issues start! 

Get fixing or get fired!




Can you last out till the next day? Or will things end in disaster?

By,

Alex Le Mesurier & Rayane Nasser
